segments.text: Welcome on board . May I see your boarding pass ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your seat is three , in the third row , near the window .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Where can I put my suitcase ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Either in the overhead compartment or underneath the seat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everyone's attention , please . We are going to take off . Please fasten your belts .
segments.speaker: S2
